subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Viktoria Rebensburg of Germany won a women’s World Cup giant slalom race Sunday in Zwiesel, Germany, and the World Cup leader Maria Riesch extended her lead on Lindsey Vonn.
snippet: Viktoria Rebensburg of Germany won a women’s World Cup giant slalom race Sunday in Zwiesel, Germany, and the World Cup leader Maria Riesch extended her lead on Lindsey Vonn.
